description: This file defines the 'Note' class for a note-taking app, including properties, constructors, and methods for copying, mapping from database records, and converting to database-compatible maps.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a note with properties such as id, title, content, pinned status, creation and update timestamps. Provides methods for creating modified copies and serializing/deserializing for database operations.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the current Note instance with specified properties replaced.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Note instance from a map of database query results.

methods.name: toInsertMap
methods.description: Converts the Note instance into a map suitable for inserting into the database.

methods.name: toUpdateMap
methods.description: Converts the Note instance into a map suitable for updating an existing database record.
